value.stringValue: ( [Case].IsClosed = true || ISPICKVAL([Case].Incident_Status__c ,"Closed") || ISPICKVAL([Case].Incident_Status__c ,"Resolved (No Customer Response)") || ISPICKVAL([Case].Incident_Status__c ,"Resolved (Permanently)") || ISPICKVAL([Case].Incident_Status__c ,"Resolved (Temp Workaround)") ) && [Case].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Community_User_Record_Type' && [Case].Account.Billing_Region_Text__c <> 'JAPAN' && NOT( ISPICKVAL([Case].Product_Family__c , "Tesla HW Family") || ISPICKVAL([Case].Product_Family__c , "Tesla SW Family") ) && [Case].Owner:Queue.DeveloperName <> 'ESP_Invalid_Case_Queue' && [Case].Customer_Survey_Sent__c = false && NOT(ISBLANK([Case].ContactId)) && NOT(ISBLANK([Case].Contact.Email))
